sentence: McConnell also likes what he sees at the outset in Georgia and Nevada, where he is backing Herschel Walker and Adam Laxalt, respectively.
author: David M. Drucker
title: 'The worst of Joe Biden will be over': McConnell pitches voters on GOP Senate

sentence: The likely GOP nominee in Georgia, Herschel Walker, is a former NFL star with his own stormy past.
author: Russell Berman
title: Mitch McConnells Nightmare Scenario
